title: Palike
description: An ancient settlement in central east Sicily, atop the Rocchicella, which included a sanctuary to the Divine Palikoi (pair of boiling lakes) within a grotto found on the hillside.

properties.description: Archeological site of sanctuary at the Grotto of Rocchicella di Mineo, Sicily, Sanctuary of the Divine Palikoi, two boiling lakes
properties.title: Hestiaterion, at Grotto of the Divine Palikoi, Rocchicella di Mineo, Sicily
